anya-e0805n0:14_0: Tattha jinasāsanādhigamassa akkharakosallamūlakattā taṁ sampādetabbanti dassetuṁ abhidheyyappayojanavākyamidamuccate.
anya-e0805n0:22_1: te ca kho jinavacanānurūpā akārādayo niggahītantā ekacattālīsamattā vaṇṇā paccekaṁ akkharā nāma honti. Taṁ yathā – ā i ī u ū e o, ka kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma,
anya-e0805n0:22_2: ya ra lava sa ha ḷa aṁ-iti akkharā.
anya-e0805n0:23_0: Nakkharantīti akkharā, a ādi yesaṁ te ādayo.
anya-e0805n0:25_2: Tavagga lakāra sakārā dantajā. Uvaṇṇa pavaggā oṭṭhajā. Ekāro kaṇṭhatālujo. Okāro kaṇṭhoṭṭhajo.
anya-e0805n0:28_0: Ṅa ña ṇa na mā sakaṭṭhānajā, nāsikaṭṭhānajā cāti.
anya-e0805n0:31_0: Karaṇaṁ jivhāmajjhaṁ tālujānaṁ, jivhopaggaṁ muddhajānaṁ, jivhāggaṁ dantajānaṁ, sesā sakaṭṭhānakaraṇā.
anya-e0805n0:32_1: vivaṭattaṁ sesasarānaṁ sakārahakārānañca, phuṭṭhaṁ vaggānaṁ, īsaṁphuṭṭhaṁ yaralavānanti.
anya-e0805n0:33_0: Evaṁ ṭhānakaraṇappayatanasutikālabhinnesu akkharesu sarā nissayā, itare nissitā. Tattha –
anya-e0805n0:34_0: Nissayādo sarā vuttā, byañjanā nissitā tato;
anya-e0805n0:44_0: Tattha tesu akkharesu akārādīsu okārantā aṭṭha akkharā sarā nāma honti.
anya-e0805n0:44_1: Taṁ yathā – a ā i ī u ū e o-iti sarā.
anya-e0805n0:45_0: O anto yesaṁ te odantā, dakāro sandhijo, saranti gacchantīti sarā, byañjane sārentītipi sarā.
anya-e0805n0:48_0: Tattha aṭṭhasu saresu lahumattā tayo sarā rassā nāma honti. Taṁ yathā – a i u-iti rassā.
anya-e0805n0:49_0: Lahukā mattā pamāṇaṁ yesaṁ te lahumattā,
anya-e0805n0:49_1: mattāsaddo cettha accharāsaṅghātaakkhinimīlanasaṅkhātaṁ kālaṁ vadati, tāya mattāya ekamattā rassā, dvimattā dīghā, aḍḍhamattā byañjanā.
anya-e0805n0:49_2: Lahuggahaṇañcettha chandasi diyaḍḍhamattassāpi gahaṇatthaṁ. Rassakālayogato rassā, rassakālavanto vā rassā.
anya-e0805n0:52_0: Tattha aṭṭhasu saresu rassehi aññe dvimattā pañca sarā dīghā nāma honti.
anya-e0805n0:52_1: Taṁ yathā – ā ī ū e o-iti dīghā.
anya-e0805n0:53_0: Aññaggahaṇaṁ diyaḍḍhamattikānampi saṅgahaṇatthaṁ. Dīghakāle niyuttā, tabbanto vā dīghā.
anya-e0805n0:53_1: Kvaci saṁyogapubbā ekārokārā rassā iva vuccante. Yathā – ettha, seyyo, oṭṭho, sotthi. Kvacīti kiṁ? Maṁ ce tvaṁ nikhaṇaṁ vane. Putto tyāhaṁ mahārāja.
anya-e0805n0:55_1: Saṁyogabhūte akkhare pare yo pubbo rassakkharo, so garusañño hoti. Yathā – datvā, hitvā, bhutvā.
anya-e0805n0:58_0: Dīgho ca saro garusañño hoti. Yathā – nāvā, nadī, vadhū, dve, tayo.
anya-e0805n0:60_0: Ṭhapetvā aṭṭha sare sesā aḍḍhamattā akkharā kakārādayo niggahītantā tettiṁsa byañjanā nāma honti. Vuttehi aññe sesā.
anya-e0805n0:60_2: Taṁ yathā – ka kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma,
anya-e0805n0:60_3: ya ra lava sa ha ḷa aṁ-iti byañjanā. Kakārādīsvakāro uccāraṇattho.
anya-e0805n0:63_0: Tesaṁ kho byañjanānaṁ kakārādayo makārantā pañcavīsati byañjanā pañcapañcavibhāgena vaggā nāma honti.
anya-e0805n0:63_1: Taṁ yathā – ka kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma-iti vaggā.
anya-e0805n0:64_0: Te pana paṭhamakkharavasena kavaggacavaggādivohāraṁ gatā, vaggoti samūho,
anya-e0805n0:64_1: tattha pañcapañcavibhāgenāti vā pañca pañca etesamatthīti vā pañcapañcaso, mo anto yesaṁ te mantā.
anya-e0805n0:66_2: aṁiti yaṁ akārato paraṁ vuttaṁ bindu, taṁ niggahītaṁ nāma hoti. Rassassaraṁ nissāya gayhati,
anya-e0805n0:69_0: Idha avuttānaṁ parasamaññānampi payojane sati gahaṇatthaṁ paribhāsamāha.
anya-e0805n0:72_2: veyyākaraṇamadhītānaṁ vā samaññātyattho. Payujjanaṁ payogo, viniyogo.
anya-e0805n0:73_0: Tattha vaggānaṁ paṭhamadutiyā, sakāro ca aghosā.
anya-e0805n0:73_2: ya ra lava ha ḷā cāti ekavīsati ghosā nāma.
anya-e0805n0:74_0: Ettha ca vaggānaṁ dutiyacatutthā dhanitātipi vuccanti, itare sithilāti. Vināso lopo.
anya-e0805n0:74_1: Rassassarā sakadīghehi aññamaññaṁ savaṇṇā nāma, ye sarūpātipi vuccanti.
anya-e0805n0:78_0: Loka aggapuggalo, paññā indriyaṁ, tīṇi imāni, no hi etaṁ, bhikkhunī ovādo, mātu upaṭṭhānaṁ, sametu āyasmā, abhibhū āyatanaṁ, dhanā me atthi, sabbe eva, tayo assu dhammā,
anya-e0805n0:78_1: asanto ettha na dissanti itīdha sarādisaññāyaṁ sabbasandhikaraṇaṭṭhāne byañjanaviyojanatthaṁ paribhāsamāha.
anya-e0805n0:80_1: sandhitabbe sarasahitaṁ pubbabyañjanaṁ anatikkamanto adhoṭhitamassarañca katvā sarato viyojayeti sarato byañjanaṁ viyojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:82_0: Sarā kho sabbepi sare pare ṭhite lopaṁ papponti. Lopoti adassanaṁ anuccāraṇaṁ. Ettha sarāti kāriyīniddeso.
anya-e0805n0:82_1: Bahuvacanaṁ panettha ekekasmiṁ sare pare bahūnaṁ lopañāpanatthaṁ. Sareti nimittaniddeso, nimittasattamī cāyaṁ,
anya-e0805n0:82_2: nimittopādānasāmatthiyato vaṇṇakālabyavadhāne sandhikāriyaṁ na hoti. Lopanti kāriyaniddeso,
anya-e0805n0:82_3: idaṁ pana suttaṁ upari paralopavidhānato pubbalopavidhānanti daṭṭhabbaṁ,
anya-e0805n0:85_0: Sararahitaṁ kho byañjanaṁ adhoṭhitaṁ parakkharaṁ naye yutte ṭhāneti paranayanaṁ kātabbaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:85_2: tena ‘‘akkocchi maṁ avadhi ma’’ntiādīsu paranayanasandeho na hoti.
anya-e0805n0:86_0: Lokaggapuggalo, paññindriyaṁ, tīṇimāni, nohetaṁ, bhikkhunovādo, mātupaṭṭhānaṁ, sametāyasmā, abhibhāyatanaṁ, dhanā matthi, sabbeva, tayassu dhammā, asantettha na dissanti.
anya-e0805n0:87_0: Yassa idāni, saññā iti, chāyā iva, kathā eva kā, iti api, assamaṇī asi, cakkhu indriyaṁ, akataññū asi, ākāse iva, te api, vande ahaṁ, so ahaṁ, cattāro ime, vasalo iti, moggallāno āsi bījako,
anya-e0805n0:87_2: idha pana ‘‘atthavasā vibhattivipariṇāmo’’ti katvā ‘‘saro, saramhā, lopa’’nti ca vattamāne –
anya-e0805n0:89_0: Asamānarūpamhā saramhā paro saro lopaṁ pappoti vā. Samānaṁ rūpaṁ assāti sarūpo, na sarūpo asarūpo, asavaṇṇo . Yasmā pana mariyādāyaṁ,
anya-e0805n0:89_1: abhividhimhi ca vattamāno āupasaggo viya vāsaddo dvidhā vattate, katthaci vikappe,
anya-e0805n0:90_0: Yassadāni yassa idāni, saññāti saññā iti, chāyāva chāyā iva, kathāva kā kathā eva kā, itīpi iti api, assamaṇīsi assamaṇī asi. Cakkhundriya miti niccaṁ. Akataññūsi akataññū asi, ākāseva ākāse iva, tepi te api, vandehaṁ vande ahaṁ, sohaṁ so ahaṁ, cattārome cattāro ime, vasaloti vasalo iti,
anya-e0805n0:90_1: moggallānosi bījako moggallāno āsi bījako, pātova pāto eva.
anya-e0805n0:91_0: Idha na bhavati – pañcindriyāni, saddhindriyaṁ, sattuttamo, ekūnavīsati, yassete, sugatovādo, diṭṭhāsavo, diṭṭhogho, cakkhāyatanaṁ, taṁ kutettha labbhā iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:95_0: Bandhussa iva, upa ikkhati, upa ito, ava icca, jina īritaṁ, na upeti, canda udayo,
anya-e0805n0:95_1: yathā udake itīdha pubbāvaṇṇassarānaṁ lope kate ‘‘paro, asarūpe’’ti ca vattate,
anya-e0805n0:97_1: ukārabhūto ca paro saro asarūpe pubbassare lutte kvaci asavaṇṇaṁ pappoti.
anya-e0805n0:98_0: Bandhusseva, upekkhati, upeto, avecca, jineritaṁ, nopeti, candodayo, yathodake. Kvacīti kiṁ? Tatrime, yassindriyāni, mahiddhiko, sabbītiyo, tenupasaṅkami, lokuttaro. Lutteti kiṁ? Cha ime dhammā, yathā idaṁ, kusalassa upasampadā. Asarūpeti kiṁ? Cattārimāni, mātupaṭṭhānaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:99_0: Ettha ca satipi heṭṭhā vāggahaṇe kvacikaraṇato avaṇṇe eva lutte idha vuttavidhi hotīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:99_1: Tato idha na bhavati – diṭṭhupādānaṁ, pañcahupāli, mudindriyaṁ, yo missaroti.
anya-e0805n0:100_0: Tatra ayaṁ, buddha anussati, sa atthikā, paññavā assa, tadā ahaṁ, yāni idha bhūtāni, gacchāmi iti, ati ito, kikī iva, bahu upakāraṁ, madhu udakaṁ, su upadhāritaṁ, yopi ayaṁ , idāni ahaṁ, sace ayaṁ, appassuto ayaṁ, itara itarena, saddhā idha vittaṁ, kamma upanissayo, tathā upamaṁ, ratti uparato,
anya-e0805n0:100_1: vi upasamo iccatra pubbassarānaṁ lope kate –
anya-e0805n0:103_0: Saro kho paro pubbassare lutte kvaci dīghabhāvaṁ pappotīti ṭhānāsannavasena rassassarānaṁ savaṇṇadīgho.
anya-e0805n0:104_0: Tatrāyaṁ, buddhānussati, sātthikā, paññavāssa, tadāhaṁ, yānīdha bhūtāni, gacchāmīti, atīto, kikīva, bahūpakāraṁ, madhūdakaṁ, sūpadhāritaṁ, yopāyaṁ, idānāhaṁ, sacāyaṁ, appassutāyaṁ, itarītarena, saddhīdha vittaṁ, kammūpanissayo, tathūpamaṁ, rattūparato, vūpasamo.
anya-e0805n0:105_0: Kvacīti kiṁ? Aciraṁ vata’yaṁ kāyo, kimpimāya, tīṇimāni, pañcasupādānakkhandhesu, tassattho, pañcaṅgiko, munindo, satindriyaṁ, lahuṭṭhānaṁ, gacchāmahaṁ, tatridaṁ, pañcahupāli, natthaññaṁ. Lutteti kiṁ? Yathā ayaṁ, nimi iva rājā, kikī iva, su upadhāritaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:106_0: Lokassa iti, deva iti, vi ati patanti, vi ati nāmenti, saṅghāṭi api, jīvitahetu api, vijju iva, kiṁsu idha vittaṁ,
anya-e0805n0:106_1: sādhu iti itīdha parassarānaṁ lope kate –
anya-e0805n0:109_0: Pubbo saro parassare lutte kvacidīghaṁ pappoti.
anya-e0805n0:110_0: Lokassāti, devāti, vītipatanti, vītināmenti, saṅghāṭīpi, jīvitahetūpi, vijjūva, kiṁsūdha vittaṁ, sādhūti.
anya-e0805n0:111_0: Kvacīti kiṁ? Yassadāni, itissa, idānipi, tesupi, cakkhundriyaṁ, kinnumāva.
anya-e0805n0:112_0: Adhigato kho me ayaṁ dhammo, putto te ahaṁ, te assa pahīnā, pabbate ahaṁ,
anya-e0805n0:114_0: Ekārassa padantabhūtassa ṭhāne sare pare kvaci yakārādeso hoti.
anya-e0805n0:114_1: Akāremeteyesaddādissevāyaṁ vidhi, yanti yaṁ rūpaṁ, e eva anto edanto, ādesiṭṭhāne ādissatīti ādeso.
anya-e0805n0:115_0: Adhigato kho myāyaṁ dhammo, putto tyāhaṁ, tyāssa pahīnā, pabbatyāhaṁ, yyāssa.
anya-e0805n0:116_0: Kvacīti kiṁ? Te nāgatā, puttā matthi. Antaggahaṇaṁ kiṁ? Dhammacakkaṁ pavattento, damento cittaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:117_0: Yāvatako assa kāyo, tāvatako assa byāmo, ko attho, atha kho assa, ahaṁ kho ajja, yo ayaṁ, so assa, so eva, yato adhikaraṇaṁ, anu addhamāsaṁ, anu eti, su āgataṁ, su ākāro, du ākāro, cakkhu āpāthaṁ, bahu ābādho, pātu akāsi, na tu evātīdha –
anya-e0805n0:119_0: Okārukārānaṁ antabhūtānaṁ sare pare kvaci vakārādeso hoti.
anya-e0805n0:120_0: Yāvatakvassa kāyo, tāvatakvassa byāmo, kvattho, atha khvassa, ahaṁ khvajja, yvāyaṁ, svassa, sveva, yatvādhikaraṇaṁ, anvaddhamāsaṁ, anvebhi, svāgataṁ, svākāro, dvākāro, cakkhvāpāthaṁ, bahvābādho, pātvākāsi, na tveva.
anya-e0805n0:121_0: Kvacīti kiṁ? Ko attho, atha kho aññatarā, yohaṁ, sohaṁ, cattārome, sāgataṁ, sādhāvuso, hotūti. Antaggahaṇaṁ kiṁ? Savanīyaṁ, viravanti.
anya-e0805n0:122_0: Paṭisanthāravutti assa, sabbā vitti anubhuyyate, vi añjanaṁ, vi ākato,
anya-e0805n0:124_0: Pubbo ivaṇṇo asarūpe sare pare yakāraṁ pappoti navā. I eva vaṇṇo ivaṇṇo, navāsaddo kvacisaddapariyāyo.
anya-e0805n0:125_0: Paṭisanthāravutyassa, sabbā vityānubhuyyate, byañjanaṁ, byākato, nadyāsanno.
anya-e0805n0:126_0: Navāti kiṁ? Pañcahaṅgehi, tāni attani, gacchāmahaṁ, muttacāgī anuddhato. Asarūpeti kiṁ? Itihidaṁ, aggīva, atthīti.
anya-e0805n0:127_0: Ati antaṁ, ati odātā, pati ayo, pati āharati, pati eti, iti assa, iti etaṁ,
anya-e0805n0:127_1: itiādi itīdha ‘‘ivaṇṇo yaṁ navā’’ti yakārādese sampatte –
anya-e0805n0:130_0: Sabbo tiicceso saddo sare pare kvaci cakāraṁ pappoti.
anya-e0805n0:130_2: itarathā kvaciggahaṇassa ca ‘‘atissa cantassā’’tisuttassa ca niratthakatā siyā.
anya-e0805n0:131_0: Accantaṁ , accodātā, paccayo, paccāharati, pacceti, iccassa, iccetaṁ, iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:133_0: ‘‘Te na vāivaṇṇe’’ti ito ‘‘na ivaṇṇe’’ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:135_0: Atiiccetassa antabhūtassa tisaddassa ivaṇṇe pare ‘‘sabbo caṁ tī’’ti vuttarūpaṁ na hoti.
anya-e0805n0:135_2: Ettha ca antasaddo saddavidhinisedhappakaraṇato atisaddantabhūtaṁ tisaddameva vadati, na ivaṇṇanti daṭṭhabbaṁ,
anya-e0805n0:137_0: Ivaṇṇassa sarūpasmiṁ, yādeso ca na sambhave.
anya-e0805n0:138_1: tena itipatīnamantassa ca na hoti. Ati isigaṇo atīsigaṇo, evaṁ atīto, atīritaṁ, itīti, itīdaṁ, patīto.
anya-e0805n0:142_0: Abhiiccetassa sabbassa sare pare abbhādeso hoti.
anya-e0805n0:146_0: Adhi agamā, adhi upagato, adhi ogāhetvā itīdha
anya-e0805n0:148_0: Adhiiccetassa sabbassa sare pare ajjhādeso hoti. Ajjhagamā, ajjhupagato, ajjhogāhetvā.
anya-e0805n0:152_0: Te ca kho abhiadhiiccete upasaggā ivaṇṇe pare abbho ajjhoiti vuttarūpā na honti vā. Saralopaparanayanāni. Abhicchitaṁ, adhīritaṁ. Vāti kiṁ? Abbhīritaṁ, ajjhiṇamutto, ajjhiṭṭho.
anya-e0805n0:155_0: Dhaiccetassa sare pare kvaci dakāro hoti.
anya-e0805n0:155_1: Ekasaddato parassa idhassa dhakārassevāyaṁ, saralopadīghā. Ekamidāhaṁ. Kvacīti kiṁ? Idheva.
anya-e0805n0:156_0: Casaddena kvaci sādhussa dhassa hakāro, yathā – sāhu dassanaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:160_1: Dīghasaramhā parassa evasaddādibhūtassa ekārassa rikāro hoti,
anya-e0805n0:160_2: pubbo ca saro rasso hoti navā. Yathariva, tathariva. Navāti kiṁ? Yatheva, tatheva.
anya-e0805n0:161_0: Ti antaṁ,ti addhaṁ, aggi agāre, sattamī atthe, pañcamī antaṁ, du aṅgikaṁ, bhikkhu āsane, puthu āsane,
anya-e0805n0:166_0: Ākhyāte liṅgamajjhe ca, dviliṅgante ca dassanā.
anya-e0805n0:168_0: Jhalaiccetesaṁ iyauvaiccete ādesā honti vā sare pare, saralopo.
anya-e0805n0:169_0: Tiyantaṁ, tiyaddhaṁ, aggiyāgāre, sattamiyatthe, pañcamiyantaṁ, duvaṅgikaṁ, bhikkhuvāsane, puthuvāsane, sayambhuvāsane. Vāti kiṁ? Agyāgāre, sattamīatthe, bhikkhuāsane nisīdati.
anya-e0805n0:173_0: Goiccetassa okārassa sare pare avādeso hoti samāse. Gavājinaṁ, gaveḷakaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:173_1: Casaddaggahaṇena uvaṇṇassa uvaavādesā. Yathā – bhuvi, pasavo.
anya-e0805n0:176_0: Puthaiccetassa nipātassa ante kvaci gakārāgamo hoti sare pare. Āgacchatīti āgamo, asantuppatti āgamo.
anya-e0805n0:176_1: Ettha ca ‘‘sare’’ti nimittāsannavasena puthassa anteti labbhati. Puthageva, putha eva.
anya-e0805n0:180_0: Pāiccetassa ante sare pare kvaci gakārāgamo hoti,
anya-e0805n0:180_1: pāssa anto ca saro rasso hoti. Pageva vutyassa, pā eva.
anya-e0805n0:182_0: 34.Yava ma da na ta ra lā cāgamā.
anya-e0805n0:183_0: Sare pare yakārādayo aṭṭha āgamā honti vā. Casaddena gakārāgamo ca,
anya-e0805n0:184_0: Tattha yakārāgamo yathādibho ikārekārādīsu. Yathā idaṁ yathayidaṁ,
anya-e0805n0:184_1: byañjaneti adhikicca ‘‘rassa’’nti rassattaṁ, yathā idaṁ vā, yathā eva, yathāyeva, yatheva, evaṁ māyidaṁ, māyevaṁ, taṁyidaṁ, taṁyeva, nayidaṁ, nayimassa, nayimāni, navayime dhammā, buddhānaṁyeva, santiyeva, bodhiyāyeva, satiyeva, pathavīyeva, dhātuyeva, tesuyeva, soyeva, pāṭiyekkaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:185_0: Tathā sare vipariyādito ca. Vi añjanā viyañjanā, byañjanā vā, evaṁ viyākāsi, byākāsi. Pariantaṁ pariyantaṁ, evaṁ pariyādānaṁ, pariyuṭṭhānaṁ, pariyesati, pariyosānamiti niccaṁ. Ni āyogo niyāyogo. Idha na bhavati, parikkhato, upaparikkhati.
anya-e0805n0:186_0: Vakāro tisaddādito avaṇṇukāresu. Ti aṅgulaṁ tivaṅgulaṁ, evaṁ tivaṅgikaṁ, bhūvādayo, migī bhantā vudikkhati, pavuccati, pāguññavujutā.
anya-e0805n0:187_0: Makāro lahuppabhutito sare chandānurakkhaṇādimhi. Lahu essati lahumessati, evaṁ garumessati, idhamāhu, kena te idha mijjhati, bhadro kasāmiva, ākāse mabhipūjayi, ekamekassa, yena midhekacce, āsatimeva.
anya-e0805n0:188_0: Dakārouupasagga saki kenaci kiñci kismiñci koci sammā yāva tāva puna ya te’tattasādīhi. Uupasaggato niccaṁ, u aggo udaggo, evaṁ udayo, udapādi, udāhaṭaṁ, udito, udīritaṁ, udeti.
anya-e0805n0:189_0: Nipātato ca, saki eva sakideva, evaṁ sakadāgāmi,
anya-e0805n0:189_1: mahāvuttisuttena ikārassa akāro. Tathā kenacideva, kiñcideva, kismiñcideva, kocideva, sammā attho sammadattho, rassattaṁ. Evaṁ sammadakkhāto, sammadaññā vimuttānaṁ, sammadeva, yāvadatthaṁ, yāvadeva, tāvadeva, punadeva.
anya-e0805n0:190_0: Nāmato, yadatthaṁ, tadatthaṁ, yadantarā, tadantarā, tadaṅgavimutti, etadatthaṁ, attadatthaṁ, sadatthapasuto siyā. Yatetattasehi samāseyeva.
anya-e0805n0:191_0: Ādisaddena aññadatthaṁ, manasādaññā vimuttānaṁ, bahudeva rattiṁ, ahudeva bhayaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:192_0: Vāti kiṁ? Kenaci atthakāmena, sammā aññāya, yāvāhaṁ, tāvāhaṁ, punāparaṁ, attatthaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:193_0: Nakāro āyatādimhi. Ito āyati ito nāyati, ciraṁ nāyati.
anya-e0805n0:194_0: Takāro yasmā tasmā ajjādito ihaggādimhi. Yasmātiha, tasmātiha, ajjatagge.
anya-e0805n0:195_0: Rakāro ni dupātu puna dhī pāta caturādito. Ni antaraṁ nirantaraṁ, evaṁ nirālayo, nirindhano, nirīhakaṁ, niruttaro, nirojaṁ. Du atikkamo duratikkamo, durāgataṁ, duruttaṁ. Pāturahosi, pāturahesuṁ. Punarāgaccheyya, punaruttaṁ, punareva, punareti. Dhiratthu. Pātarāso.
anya-e0805n0:196_0: Catusaddādito, caturaṅgikaṁ, caturārakkhā, caturiddhipādapaṭilābho, caturoghanittharaṇatthaṁ. Bhatturatthe, vuttiresā, pathavīdhāturevesā.
anya-e0805n0:197_0: Tathā sarato ivevesu chandānurakkhaṇe. Nakkhattarājāriva tārakānaṁ, vijjurivabbhakūṭe, āraggeriva sāsapo, sāsaporiva āragge, usabhoriva, sabbhireva samāsetha.
anya-e0805n0:199_0: Lakāro chasaṅkhyāhi. Laḷānamaviseso. Cha abhiññā chaḷabhiññā, chaḷaṅgaṁ, chaḷāsīti, chaḷaṁsā, saḷāyatanaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:207_0: Itthiyaṁ vattamānā akārantato liṅgamhā paro āppaccayo hoti.
anya-e0805n0:210_1: paranayane ca kate ‘‘dhātuppaccayavibhattivajjitamatthavaṁ liṅga’’nti vuttattāva paccayantassāpi aliṅgattā vibhattuppattiyamasampattāyaṁ ‘‘taddhitasamāsakitakā nāmaṁ vā’tavetunādīsu cā’’ti ettha vaggahaṇena itthippaccayantassāpi nāmabyapadeso. Pure viya syādyuppatti,
anya-e0805n0:213_1: tadā ghasañño hotīti ghasaññāyaṁ ‘‘ghapato ca yonaṁ lopo’’ti vikappena yolopo. Tā kaññā kaññāyo.
anya-e0805n0:216_0: Ghato parassa gassa ekāro hoti, saralopādi. Bhoti kaññe, bhotiyo kaññā kaññāyo.
anya-e0805n0:218_0: Tatiyādīsu ‘‘āya catutthekavacanassa tū’’ti ito ‘‘āyo, ekavacanāna’’nti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:220_0: Ghasaññato liṅgassākārā paresaṁ nādīnaṁ smiṁpariyantānaṁ ekavacanānaṁ vibhattigaṇānaṁ āyādeso hoti. Saralopaparanayanāni. Kaññāya, kaññāhi kaññābhi, kaññāya, kaññānaṁ, kaññāya, kaññāhi kaññābhi, kaññāya, kaññānaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:223_0: Ghapato parassa smiṁvacanassa yaṁ hoti vā, aññatthāyādeso. Kaññāyaṁ kaññāya, kaññāsu.
anya-e0805n0:225_0: Saddhā medhā paññā vijjā, cintā mantā vīṇā taṇhā;
anya-e0805n0:226_0: Icchā mucchā ejā māyā, mettā mattā sikkhā bhikkhā.
anya-e0805n0:231_0: Pipāsā vedanā saññā, cetanā tasiṇā pajā;
anya-e0805n0:232_0: Devatā vaṭṭakā godhā, balākā parisā sabhā.
anya-e0805n0:234_0: Visākhā visikhā sākhā, vacā vañjhā jaṭā ghaṭā.
anya-e0805n0:235_0: Jeṭṭhā soṇḍā vitaṇḍā ca, karuṇā vanitā latā;
anya-e0805n0:236_0: Kathā niddā sudhā rādhā, vāsanā siṁsapā papā.
anya-e0805n0:242_0: Nāsā juṇhā guhā īhā, lasikā vasudhādayo.
anya-e0805n0:243_0: Ammādīnaṁ ālapaneva rūpabhedo. Ammā, ammā ammāyo.
anya-e0805n0:246_0: Ammā annāiccevamādito parassa gassa ālapanekavacanassa na ekārattaṁ hoti. ‘‘Ākāro vā’’ti rassattaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:247_0: Bhoti amma bhoti ammā, bhotiyo ammā ammāyo. Evaṁ annā, annā annāyo, bhoti anna bhoti annā, bhotiyo annā annāyo. Ambā , ambā ambāyo, bhoti amba bhoti ambā, bhotiyo ambā ambāyo iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:253_2: tadā pasaññā hontīti pasaññāyaṁ ‘‘ghapato cā’’tiādinā yolopo, ‘‘yosu kata’’iccādinā dīgho. Rattī rattiyo ratyo vā, he ratti, he rattī he rattiyo.
anya-e0805n0:257_0: Pasaññato ivaṇṇuvaṇṇehi paresaṁ nādīnamekavacanānaṁ vibhattigaṇānaṁ yāādeso hoti. Rattiyā,
anya-e0805n0:257_1: rattīhi rattībhi rattihi rattibhi, rattiyā, rattīnaṁ rattinaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:260_0: Paiccetasmā paresaṁ smiṁ smāiccetesaṁ yathākkamaṁ aṁ āādesā honti vā.
anya-e0805n0:260_1: Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo , tena uvaṇṇantato na honti, ivaṇṇantatopi yathāpayogaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:263_0: Pasaññassa ivaṇṇassa yovacanekavacanavibhattīnamādese sare pare yakāro hoti.
anya-e0805n0:263_1: Ettha ca yakārassevādhikārato pasaññaggahaṇena ivaṇṇova gayhati,
anya-e0805n0:263_3: rattīhi rattībhi rattihi rattibhi, rattiyā, rattīnaṁ rattinaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:266_0: Ādiiccetasmā smiṁvacanassa aṁ oādesā honti vā.
anya-e0805n0:266_1: Casaddena aññasmāpi ā aṁ oādesā. Ratyā rattiṁ ratto rattiyā, rattīsu rattisu.
anya-e0805n0:268_0: Patti yutti vutti kitti, mutti titti khanti kanti;
anya-e0805n0:269_0: Santi tanti siddhi suddhi, iddhi vuddhi buddhi bodhi.
anya-e0805n0:270_0: Bhūmi jāti pīti sūti, nandi sandhi sāṇi koṭi;
anya-e0805n0:271_0: Diṭṭhi vuḍḍhi tuṭṭhi yaṭṭhi, pāḷi āḷi nāḷi keḷi;
anya-e0805n0:272_0: Sati mati gati cuti, dhiti yuvati vikati.
anya-e0805n0:273_0: Rati ruci rasmi asani vasani osadhi aṅguli dhūli dundubhi doṇi aṭavi chavi ādīni ikārantanāmāni.
anya-e0805n0:278_0: Nadādito vā anadādito vā itthiyaṁ vattamānā liṅgamhā īppaccayo hoti.
anya-e0805n0:279_0: Saralope ‘‘kvacāsavaṇṇaṁ lutte’’ti asavaṇṇe sampatte pakatibhāvo nāmabyapadeso, syādyuppatti. Itthī,
anya-e0805n0:279_2: Sambodhane ‘‘jhalapā rassa’’nti rassattaṁ. Bhoti itthi, bhotiyo itthī itthiyo.
anya-e0805n0:280_0: Dutiyekavacane ‘‘ghapato smiṁ yaṁ vā’’ti ito ‘‘vā’’ti vattate.
anya-e0805n0:282_0: Pasaññato īkārato parassa aṁvacanassa yaṁ hoti vā. Itthiyaṁ itthiṁ, itthī itthiyo, itthiyā, itthīhi itthībhi, itthiyā, itthīnaṁ, itthiyā, itthīhi itthībhi, itthiyā, itthīnaṁ, itthiyaṁ itthiyā, itthīsu.
anya-e0805n0:283_1: Yolopābhāve ‘‘tato yonamo tū’’ti ettha tusaddena yonamokāro ca,
anya-e0805n0:283_3: ‘‘yavataṁ talana’’iccādinā dyassa jakāro, dvittaṁ. Najjo sandanti, nadiyo.
anya-e0805n0:284_0: Ettha cevaṁ sijjhantānaṁ najjoādīnaṁ vuttiyaṁ ānattaggahaṇādinā nipphādanaṁ atraja sugatādīnaṁ viya nipphādanūpāyantaradassanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:285_0: He nadi, he nadī he najjo he nadiyo, nadiyaṁ nadiṁ, nadī najjo nadiyo.
anya-e0805n0:286_0: Amādisutte ā patoti yogavibhāgena kvaci nāsānañcāttaṁ, tena na jaccā vasalo hoti,
anya-e0805n0:287_0: Najjā kataṁ nadiyā, nadīhi nadībhi, najjā nadiyā, nadīnaṁ, najjā nadiyā, nadīhi nadībhi, najjā nadiyā, nadīnaṁ, najjaṁ nadiyaṁ nadiyā, nadīsu.
anya-e0805n0:289_0: Mahī vetaraṇī vāpī, pāṭalī kadalī ghaṭī;
anya-e0805n0:290_0: Nārī kumārī taruṇī, vāruṇī brāhmaṇī sakhī.
anya-e0805n0:291_0: Gandhabbī kinnarī nāgī, devī yakkhī ajī migī;
anya-e0805n0:292_0: Vānarī sūkarī sīhī, haṁsī kākī ca kukkuṭī –
anya-e0805n0:296_0: Mātula ayyakavaruṇaiccevamādīnamanto ānattamāpajjate īkāre paccaye pare, antāpekkhāyaṁ chaṭṭhī, saralopādi. Mātulānī, evaṁ ayyakānī, varuṇānī, sesaṁ itthīsaddasamaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:297_1: ‘‘O sare cā’’ti ettha casaddena ukārassa avādeso. Puthavī, puthaviyo.
anya-e0805n0:297_2: Sasmā smiṁsu puthabyā puthaviyā, puthabyā puthaviyā,
anya-e0805n0:298_1: Mahāvuttinā vā ‘‘gāva se’’ti ettha gāvaiti yogavibhāgena vā okārassa āvādeso. Gāvī,
anya-e0805n0:301_0: Ṇava ṇika ṇeyya ṇantuppaccayantehi itthiyaṁ vattamānehi liṅgehi īppaccayo hoti.
anya-e0805n0:301_1: Vādhikāro katthaci nivattanattho, saralopādi. Mānavī, evaṁ nāvikī, venateyyī, gotamī.
anya-e0805n0:304_0: Sabbasseva ntuppaccayassa takāro hoti vā īkārappaccaye pare, aññattha saralopādi. Guṇavatī, guṇavatī guṇavatiyo, guṇavantī,
anya-e0805n0:305_0: Evaṁ kulavatī, sīlavatī, yasavatī, rūpavatī, satimatī, gottamatī.
anya-e0805n0:309_0: Sabbasseva bhavantasaddassa bhotādeso hoti īkāre itthigate pare. Sā bhotī, bhotī bhotiyo, he bhoti, he bhotī bhotiyo iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:312_0: Pati bhikkhu rāja iccetehi īkārantehi ca itthiyaṁ vattamānehi liṅgehi inīppaccayo hoti.
anya-e0805n0:313_0: ‘‘Saralopo’mādesa’’iccādisutte tuggahaṇena kvaci pubbalopassa nisedhanato ‘‘vā paro asarūpā’’ti saralopo. Bhikkhunī, bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyo iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:316_1: Tatheva parasare lutte ‘‘pubbo cā’’ti dīgho, gahapatānī.
anya-e0805n0:317_0: Tatheva rājasaddato inī, saralopapakatibhāvā, rājinī. Īkārantesu daṇḍīsaddato inī, saralopādi, daṇḍinī, daṇḍinī daṇḍiniyo, evaṁ hatthinī, medhāvinī, tapassinī, piyabhāṇinī iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:318_0: ‘‘Pokkharinī’’ itīdha ‘‘tesu vuddhī’’tiādinā ikāranakārānaṁ akāraṇakārādesā, pokkharaṇī, pokkharaṇī.
anya-e0805n0:318_1: ‘‘Tato yonamo tū’’ti sutte tuggahaṇena yonamokāro ca, īkārassa yakāro,
anya-e0805n0:319_0: Vādhikāro anuttasamuccayattho, tena vidū yakkhāditopi inī, paracittavidunī, saraloparassattāni,
anya-e0805n0:319_1: paracittavidunī paracittaviduniyo, yakkhinī yakkhiniyo, sīhinī sīhiniyo iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:323_0: Yāgu, yāgū yāguyo, he yāgu, he yāgū yāguyo, yāguṁ, yāgū yāguyo, yāguyā,
anya-e0805n0:323_1: yāgūhi yāgūbhi yāguhi yāgubhi, yāguyā, yāgūnaṁ yāgunaṁ, yāguyā,
anya-e0805n0:323_2: yāgūhi yāgūbhi yāguhi yāgubhi, yāguyā, yāgūnaṁ yāgunaṁ, yāguyaṁ yāguyā, yāgūsu yāgusu.
anya-e0805n0:324_0: Evaṁ dhātu dhenu kāsu daddu kacchu kaṇḍu rajju kareṇu piyaṅgu sassuādīni.
anya-e0805n0:326_0: Mātā, mātaro, bhoti māta, bhoti mātā bhotiyo mātaro, mātaraṁ, mātare mātaro, mātarā mātuyā matyā,
anya-e0805n0:326_2: Mātarehi mātarebhi mātūhi mātūbhi mātuhi mātubhi, mātu mātussa mātuyā,
anya-e0805n0:326_3: mātarānaṁ mātānaṁ mātūnaṁ mātunaṁ, mātarā mātuyā,
anya-e0805n0:326_4: mātarehi mātarebhi mātūhi mātūbhi, mātu mātussa mātuyā,
anya-e0805n0:326_5: mātarānaṁ mātānaṁ mātūnaṁ mātunaṁ, mātari, mātaresu mātūsu mātusu.
anya-e0805n0:327_0: Evaṁ dhītā, dhītaro, duhitā, duhitaro iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:330_0: Jambū, jambū jambuyo, he jambu, he jambū jambuyo, jambuṁ,
anya-e0805n0:331_0: Evaṁ vadhū ca sarabhū, sarabū sutanū camū;
anya-e0805n0:336_0: Kaññā ratti nadī itthī, mātulānī ca bhikkhunī;
anya-e0805n0:337_0: Daṇḍinī yāgu mātā ca, jambū gotitthisaṅgaho.
anya-e0805n0:345_1: Akārantehi napuṁsakaliṅgehi parassa sivacanassa aṁ hoti niccaṁ. Saralopapakatibhāvādi, cittaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:348_0: Akārantehi napuṁsakaliṅgehi yonaṁ niccaṁ ni hoti.
anya-e0805n0:351_0: Ālapane galopo. He citta, he cittā cittāni,
anya-e0805n0:351_1: dutiyāyaṁ nissa vikappenekāro. Cittaṁ, citte cittāni. Sesaṁ purisasaddena samaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:367_0: Kammaṁ, kammā kammāni, he kamma, he kammā kammāni, kammaṁ, kamme kammāni.
anya-e0805n0:370_0: Kammasaddantassa ukāra akārādesā honti vā nāmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n0:370_2: Casaddaggahaṇena yuva maghavānamantassa ā hoti kvaci nā suiccetesu. Kammunā kammanā kammena vā, kammehi kammebhi.
anya-e0805n0:371_0: Sasmāsu ‘‘u nāmhi cā’’ti ettha casaddena puma kammathāmantassa cukāro vā sasmāsūti uttaṁ. Kammuno kammassa, kammānaṁ,
anya-e0805n0:371_1: kammunā kammā kammamhā kammasmā, kammehi kammebhi, kammuno kammassa, kammānaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:372_0: Smiṁvacane ‘‘brahmato tu smiṁnī’’ti ettha tusaddena kvaci ni hoti.
anya-e0805n0:373_0: Evaṁ thāmunā thāmena thāmasā vā, thāmuno thāmassa, thāmunā thāmā. Addhunā, addhuno iccādi purimasamaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:374_0: Guṇavantu si, ‘‘savibhattissa, ntussa, simhī’’ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:376_0: Napuṁsake vattamānassa liṅgassa sambandhino ntuppaccayassa savibhattissa aṁ hoti simhi vibhattimhi. Guṇavaṁ cittaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:377_0: Yomhi ‘‘ntussanto yosu cā’’ti attaṁ, ikāro ca. Guṇavanti, guṇavantāni, sesaṁ ñeyyaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:378_1: ‘‘simhi gacchantādīnaṁ ntasaddo a’’miti aṁ. Gacchaṁ gacchantaṁ, gacchantā gacchantāni.
anya-e0805n0:382_0: ‘‘Samāsassā’’ti adhikicca ‘‘saro rasso napuṁsake’’ti samāsantassa rassattaṁ, samāsattā nāmabyapadeso, syādyuppatti. Sesaṁ cittasamaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:384_1: Tassa dvandekattā sabbatthekavacanameva. Mukhanāsikaṁ, he mukhanāsika, mukhanāsikaṁ, mukhanāsikena iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:390_0: Napuṁsakaliṅgehi paresaṁ sabbesaṁ yonaṁ ni hoti vā.
anya-e0805n0:391_0: Aṭṭhīni, aññattha niccaṁ yolopo, dīgho ca, aṭṭhī, tathā he aṭṭhi, he aṭṭhī aṭṭhīni, aṭṭhiṁ, aṭṭhī aṭṭhīni,
anya-e0805n0:392_0: Evaṁ satthi dadhi vāri akkhi acchi acci iccādīni.
anya-e0805n0:395_0: ‘‘Sukhabhārī si’’ itīdha anapuṁsakattābhāvā sismimpi ‘‘agho rassa’’miccādinā rassattaṁ, silopo. Sukhakāri dānaṁ, sukhakārī sukhakārīni, he sukhakāri, he sukhakārī he sukhakārīni, sukhakārinaṁ sukhakāriṁ, sukhakārī sukhakārīni.
anya-e0805n0:399_0: Āyu, āyū āyūni, he āyu, he āyū he āyūni, āyuṁ, āyū āyūni,
anya-e0805n0:399_1: āyunā āyusāti manogaṇādittā siddhaṁ. Āyūhi āyūbhi, āyuno āyussa, āyūnamiccādi.
anya-e0805n0:400_0: Evaṁ cakkhu vasu dhanu dāru tipu madhu hiṅgu siggu vatthu matthu jatu ambu assuādīni.
anya-e0805n0:403_0: Gotrabhū si, napuṁsakattā rassattaṁ, silopo. Gotrabhu cittaṁ, gotrabhū gotrabhūni, he gotrabhu, he gotrabhū he gotrabhūni, gotrabhuṁ, gotrabhū gotrabhūni,
anya-e0805n0:407_0: ‘‘Cittā gāvo assa kulassā’’ti atthe bahubbīhisamāse kate ‘‘saro rasso napuṁsake’’ti okārassa ṭhānappayatanāsannattā rassattamukāro, syādyuppatti, silopo. Cittagu kulaṁ,
anya-e0805n0:414_0: Sabba, katara, katama, ubhaya, itara, añña, aññatara, aññatama, pubba, para, apara, dakkhiṇa, uttara, adhara, ya, ta, eta, ima, amu, kiṁ, eka, ubha, dvi, ti, catu, tumha,
anya-e0805n0:414_1: amha iti sattavīsati sabbanāmāni, tāni sabbanāmattā tiliṅgāni.
anya-e0805n0:415_1: so yadā pulliṅgavisiṭṭhatthābhidhāyī, tadā rūpanayo. Pure viya syādyuppatti, ‘‘so’’ti sissa okāro, saralopaparanayanāni. Sabbo jano.
anya-e0805n0:416_0: Bahuvacane ‘‘sabba yo’’ itīdha ‘‘parasamaññā payoge’’ti sabbādīnaṁ sabbanāmasaññā.
anya-e0805n0:419_1: tesaṁ sabbesaṁ sabbanāmasaññānaṁ liṅgānaṁ akārato paro paṭhamo yo ettamāpajjate. Sabbe purisā.
anya-e0805n0:421_0: He sabba sabbā, he sabbe, sabbaṁ, sabbe, sabbena, sabbehi sabbebhi.
anya-e0805n0:425_0: Akārantehi sabbanāmehi paresaṁ smā smiṁ iccetesaṁ,
anya-e0805n0:425_1: catutthekavacanassa ca ā e āyaiccete ādesā neva hontīti āyādesābhāvo.
anya-e0805n0:425_3: tena pubbādīhi smā smiṁnaṁ ā e ca honti. Sabbassa.
anya-e0805n0:428_0: Sabbesaṁ sabbanāmānaṁ akāro ettamāpajjate naṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n0:431_0: Sabbato sabbanāmato parassa naṁvacanassa saṁ sānaṁiccete ādesā honti.
anya-e0805n0:432_0: Sabbesaṁ sabbesānaṁ, sabbasmā sabbamhā, sabbehi sabbebhi, sabbassa, sabbesaṁ sabbesānaṁ, sabbasmiṁ sabbamhi, sabbesu.
anya-e0805n0:433_1: Aññaṁ kaññāsaddasamaṁ aññatra sa naṁ smiṁvacanehi. Sabbā pajā, sabbā sabbāyo, he sabbe, he sabbā sabbāyo, sabbaṁ, sabbā sabbāyo, sabbāya, sabbāhi sabbābhi.
anya-e0805n0:436_0: Sabbato sabbanāmato ghapasaññato smiṁ saiccetesaṁ yathākkamaṁ saṁsāādesā honti vā.
anya-e0805n0:439_0: Ghasañño ākāro rassamāpajjate saṁsāsvekavacanesu vibhattādesesu paresu.
anya-e0805n0:442_0: Saṁ sāiccetesu ekavacanaṭṭhānasambhūtesu vibhattādesesu paresu liṅgamhā sakārāgamo hoti.
anya-e0805n0:443_0: Sabbassā sabbāya, sabbāsaṁ sabbāsānaṁ, sabbāya, sabbāhi sabbābhi, sabbassā sabbāya, sabbāsaṁ sabbāsānaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:446_0: Etehi sabbanāmehi ghapasaññehi parassa smiṁvacanassa neva āya yādesā hontīti āyābhāvo.
anya-e0805n0:446_1: Vādhikārato kvaci hoti dakkhiṇāya uttarāyāti ādi.
anya-e0805n0:448_0: Napuṁsake sabbaṁ cittaṁ, sabbāni, he sabba, he sabbāni, sabbaṁ, sabbāni. Sesaṁ pulliṅge viya ñeyyaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:449_0: Evaṁ katarādīnaṁ aññatamasaddapariyantānaṁ tīsupi liṅgesu rūpanayo.
anya-e0805n0:457_0: Dvandasamāsaṭṭhā sabbanāmakārato paro paṭhamo yo ettamāpajjate vā.
anya-e0805n0:457_1: Kataro ca katamo cāti katarakatame, katarakatamā vā iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:459_1: Bahuvacane ‘‘dhātuliṅgehi parā paccayā’’ti ettha parāti niddesato pubbādīhi yovacanassa vikappenekāro.
anya-e0805n0:460_0: Pubbe pubbā, he pubba, he pubbe he pubbā, pubbaṁ, pubbe, pubbena, pubbehi pubbebhi, pubbassa, pubbesaṁ pubbesānaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:460_1: ‘‘Smāsmiṁnaṁ vā’’ti vikappenākārekārā. Pubbā pubbasmā pubbamhā, pubbehi pubbebhi, pubbassa, pubbesaṁ pubbesānaṁ, pubbe pubbasmiṁ pubbamhi, pubbesu.
anya-e0805n0:462_0: Napuṁsake pubbaṁ ṭhānaṁ, pubbāni, he pubba, he pubbāni, pubbaṁ, pubbāni, sesaṁ pulliṅgasamaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:465_0: Dvandaṭṭhā sabbanāmato parassa yovacanassa ṭhapetvā ettaṁ aññaṁ sabbanāmikaṁ kāriyaṁ na hotīti saṁsānamādesābhāvo. Pubbāparānaṁ,
anya-e0805n0:465_2: ‘‘nāññaṁ sabbanāmika’’nti vinādhikārena yogena tatiyāsamāsepi. Māsapubbāya, māsapubbānaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:468_0: Bahubbīhimhi ca samāse sabbanāmikavidhānaṁ nāññaṁ hoti. Piyapubbāya, piyapubbānaṁ, piyapubbe.
anya-e0805n0:470_0: Dakkhiṇassā ca pubbassā ca yadantarāḷanti atthe bahubbīhi, dakkhiṇapubbassaṁ, dakkhiṇapubbassā, evaṁ uttarapubbassaṁ, uttarapubbassā iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:471_0: Yatetasaddādīnamālapane rūpaṁ na sambhavati. Yasaddo aniyamattho.
anya-e0805n0:472_0: Yo puriso, ye purisā, yaṁ, ye. Yā kaññā, yā yāyo, yaṁ, yā yāyo. Yaṁ cittaṁ, yāni, yaṁ, yāni.
anya-e0805n0:473_0: Taeta ima amu kiṁiccete parammukha samīpa accantasamīpadūra pucchanatthavacanā.
anya-e0805n0:477_0: Eta taiccetesaṁ anapuṁsakānaṁ takāro sakāramāpajjate simhi vibhattimhi. So puriso.
anya-e0805n0:480_0: Taiccetassa sabbanāmassa takārassa nattaṁ hoti vā sabbattha liṅgesu. Ne te, naṁ taṁ, ne te, nena tena, nehi nebhi tehi tebhi.
anya-e0805n0:483_0: Taiccetassa sabbanāmassa sabbasseva attaṁ hoti vā sa smā smiṁ saṁ sāiccetesu vacanesu sabbattha liṅgesu. Assa nassa tassa, nesaṁ tesaṁ nesānaṁ tesānaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:484_0: ‘‘Smāhismiṁnaṁ mhābhimhi vā’’ti ito ‘‘smāsmiṁnaṁ, mhāmhī’’ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:486_0: Ta imaiccetehi katākārehi paresaṁ smāsmiṁnaṁ mhā mhiiccete ādesā na honti.
anya-e0805n0:488_0: Atha sarānameva sandhikāriye sampatte pakatibhāvo vuccate.
anya-e0805n0:491_0: Sarā kho sare pare kvaci chandabhedāsukhuccāraṇaṭṭhāne,
anya-e0805n0:492_0: Tattha pakatiṭṭhānaṁ nāma ālapanantā anitismiṁ acchandānurakkhaṇe asamāse padantadīghā ca ikārukārā ca nāmapadantātītakriyādimhīti evamādi.
anya-e0805n0:493_0: Ālapanantesu tāva – katamā cānanda aniccasaññā, katamā cānanda ādīnavasaññā, sāriputta idhekacco, ehi sivika uṭṭhehi, upāsakā idhekacco, bhoti ayye, bhikkhu arogaṁ tava sīlaṁ, siñca bhikkhu imaṁ nāvaṁ, bhikkhave evaṁ vadāmi,
anya-e0805n0:494_0: Kvaciggahaṇena itismiṁ chandānurakkhaṇe sandhi hoti, yathā – sakkā devīti, namo te buddha vīratthu.
anya-e0805n0:495_0: Sareti kiṁ? Sādhu mahārājāti, evaṁ kira bhikkhūti.
anya-e0805n0:496_0: Asamāse padantadīghesu – āyasmā ānando gāthā ajjhabhāsi, devā ābhassarā yathā, tevijjā iddhippattā ca, bhagavā uṭṭhāyāsanā, bhagavā etadavoca,
anya-e0805n0:496_1: abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi, gantvā olokento, bhūtavādī atthavādī, yaṁ itthī arahā assa, sāmāvatī āha, pāpakārī ubhayattha tappati, nadī ottharati, ye te bhikkhū appicchā, bhikkhū āmantesi, bhikkhūujjhāyiṁsu, bhikkhū evamāhaṁsu, imasmiṁ gāme ārakkhakā, sabbe ime, katame ekādasa, gambhīre odakantike, appamādo amatapadaṁ, saṅgho āgacchatu, ko imaṁ pathaviṁ viccessati, āloko udapādi, eko ekāya, cattāro oghā.
anya-e0805n0:497_0: Nipātesupi – are ahampi, sace imassa kāyassa, no abhikkamo, aho acchariyo, atho anto ca, atha kho āyasmā, atho oṭṭhavacittakā, tato āmantayī satthā.
anya-e0805n0:498_0: Kvaciggahaṇena akāra itīvevetthādīsu sandhipi. Yathā – āgatattha, āgatamhā, katamāssu cattāro, appassutāyaṁ puriso, itthīti, ca marīva, sabbeva, sveva, eseva nayo, parisuddhetthāyasmanto, nettha, taṁ kutettha labbhā, sacesa brāhmaṇa, tathūpamaṁ, yathāha.
anya-e0805n0:499_0: Asamāseti kiṁ? Jivhāyatanaṁ, avijjogho, itthindriyaṁ, abhibhāyatanaṁ, bhayatupaṭṭhānaṁ. Acchandānurakkhaṇeti kiṁ?
anya-e0805n0:499_1: Saddhīdha vittaṁ purisassa seṭṭhaṁ, yo missaro.
anya-e0805n0:500_0: Nāmapadantaikārukāresu – gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi, pupphāni āhariṁsu, satthu adāsi.
anya-e0805n0:503_0: Sarā kho byañjane pare pakatirūpā hontīti yebhuyyena dīgharassalopehi vikārābhāvo. Yathā – accayo, paccayo, bhāsati vā karoti vā, vedanākkhandho, bhāgyavā, bhadro kasāmiva, dīyati, tuṇhībhūto, so dhammaṁ deseti.
anya-e0805n0:509_0: Sarā kho byañjane pare kvaci dīghaṁ pappontīti suttasukhuccāraṇachandānurakkhaṇaṭṭhānesu dīgho.
anya-e0805n0:510_0: Tyassa pahīnā tyāssa pahīnā, svassa svāssa,
anya-e0805n0:510_1: madhuva maññati bālo madhuvā maññatī bālo, tathā evaṁ gāme munī care,
anya-e0805n0:510_2: khantī paramaṁ tapo titikkhā, na maṅkū bhavissāmi, svākkhāto, yvāhaṁ, kāmato jāyatī soko, kāmato jāyatī bhayaṁ, sakko ujū ca suhujū ca, anūpaghāto, dūrakkhaṁ, dūramaṁ, sūrakkhaṁ, dūharatā.
anya-e0805n0:512_0: Yiṭṭhaṁ vā hutaṁ vā loke, yadi vā sāvake, puggalā dhammadasā te, bhovādī nāma so hoti, yathābhāvī guṇena so itīdha –
anya-e0805n0:515_0: Sarā kho byañjane pare kvaci rassaṁ pappontīti chandānurakkhaṇe, āgame, saṁyoge ca rassattaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:516_0: Chandānurakkhaṇe tāva yiṭṭhaṁva hutaṁva loke, yadiva sāvake, puggala dhammadasā te, bhovādi nāma so hoti, yathābhāvi guṇena so.
anya-e0805n0:518_0: Saṁyoge parākamo parakkamo, āsādo assādo, evaṁ taṇhakkhayo, jhānassa lābhimhi, vasimhi, thullaccayo.
anya-e0805n0:519_0: Kvacīti kiṁ? Māyidaṁ, manasā daññā vimuttānaṁ, yathākkamaṁ, ākhyātikaṁ, dīyyati, sūyyati.
anya-e0805n0:523_0: Sarā kho byañjane pare kvaci lopaṁ papponti,
anya-e0805n0:523_1: tatra lutte ṭhāne akārāgamo ca hoti.
anya-e0805n0:524_0: Esa kho byantiṁ kāhiti, sa gacchaṁ na nivattati, evaṁ esa dhammo, esa pattosi, sa muni, sa sīlavā.
anya-e0805n0:525_0: Kvacīti kiṁ? Eso dhammo, so muni, so sīlavā.
anya-e0805n0:526_0: Casaddena etasaddantassa sarepi kvaci lopo. Yathā – esa attho, esa ābhogo, esa idāni.
anya-e0805n0:529_0: Saramhā parassa byañjanassa dvebhāvo hoti ṭhāne. Dvinnaṁ bhāvo dvibhāvo, so eva dvebhāvo.
anya-e0805n0:530_0: Ettha ca ṭhānaṁ nāma rassākārato paraṁ pa pati paṭikamukusa kudha kī gaha juta ñāsi su sambhū sara sasādīnamādibyañjanānaṁ dvebhāvaṁ,
anya-e0805n0:530_1: tika taya tiṁsa vatādīnamādi ca, vatu vaṭudisādīnamantañca,
anya-e0805n0:530_2: u du ni-upasagga ta catu cha santasaddādesādiparañca,
anya-e0805n0:533_0: Chandānurakkhaṇe ca – ghara jhe dhaṁsu bhamādīnamādi ca,
anya-e0805n0:534_0: Tattha pa pati paṭīsu tāva – idha pamādo idhappamādo, evaṁ appamādo, vippayutto, suppasanno,
anya-e0805n0:534_1: sammā padhānaṁ sammappadhānaṁ, rassattaṁ, appativattiyo, adhipatippaccayo, suppatiṭṭhito, appaṭipuggalo, vippaṭisāro, suppaṭipanno, suppaṭipatti.
anya-e0805n0:535_0: Kamādidhātūsu – pakkamo, paṭikkamo, hetukkamo, ākamati akkamati, evaṁ parakkamati, yathākkamaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:539_0: Paggaho, viggaho, anuggaho, niggaho, candaggaho, diṭṭhiggāho.
anya-e0805n0:541_0: Kataññū, viññū, paññāṇaṁ, viññāṇaṁ, anuññā, manuññā, samaññā.
anya-e0805n0:547_0: Avissajjento, vissajjento, pariccajanto, upaddavo, upakkiliṭṭho, mittaddu, āyabbayo, udabbahi iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:548_0: Saramhāti kiṁ? Sampayutto, sampatijāto, sampaṭicchannaṁ, saṅkamanto, saṅgaho.
anya-e0805n0:549_0: Ṭhāneti kiṁ? Mā ca pamādo, patigayhati, vacīpakopaṁ rakkheyya, ye pamattā yathā matā, manopakopaṁ rakkheyya, idha modati, pecca modati.
anya-e0805n0:550_0: Tikādīsu – kusalattikaṁ, pītittikaṁ, hetuttikaṁ, vedanāttikaṁ, lokattayaṁ, bodhittayaṁ, vatthuttayaṁ. Ekattiṁsa, dvattiṁsa, catuttiṁsa. Sīlabbataṁ, subbato, sappītiko, samannāgato, punappunaṁ iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:551_0: Vatu vaṭu disādīnamante yathā – vattati, vaṭṭati, dassanaṁ, phasso iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:552_0: U du ni upasaggādiparesu – ukaṁso ukkaṁso. Dukaraṁ dukkaraṁ, nikaṅkho nikkaṅkhe.
anya-e0805n0:553_0: Evaṁ uggataṁ, duccaritaṁ, nijjaṭaṁ, uññātaṁ, unnati, uttaro, dukkaro, niddaro, unnato, duppañño, dubbalo, nimmalo, uyyutto, dullabho, nibbatto, ussāho, dussaho, nissāro.
anya-e0805n0:554_0: Tathā takkaro, tajjo, tanninno, tappabhavo, tammayo.
anya-e0805n0:558_0: Ṭhāneti kiṁ? Nikāyo, nidānaṁ, nivāso, nivāto, tato, catuvīsati, chasaṭṭhi.
anya-e0805n0:559_0: Yakārādimhi – nīyyati, sūyyati, abhibhūyya, viceyya, vineyya, dheyyaṁ, neyyaṁ, seyyo, jeyyo, veyyākaraṇo.
anya-e0805n0:563_0: Yavatamādese – jāti andho, vipali āso, ani āyo, yadi evaṁ, api ekacce, api ekadā iccatra,
anya-e0805n0:564_0: ‘‘Sabbassa so dāmhi vā’’ti ito maṇḍūkagatiyā vāti vattate.
anya-e0805n0:566_0: Yakāravantānaṁ talanadakārānaṁ saṁyogabyañjanāni yathākkamaṁ calañajakārattamāpajjante vā.
anya-e0805n0:567_0: Kāraggahaṇaṁ yavataṁ sakāra ka ca ṭa pavaggānaṁ sakārakacaṭapavaggādesatthaṁ,
anya-e0805n0:567_1: tathā yavataṁ ta dha ṇakārānaṁ cha jhañakārādesatthañca,
anya-e0805n0:568_0: Jaccandho, vipallāso, aññāyo, yajjevaṁ, appekacce appekadā.
anya-e0805n0:572_0: Chandānurakkhaṇe – nappajjahe vaṇṇabalaṁ purāṇaṁ, ujjugatesu seyyo, gacchanti suggatinti.
anya-e0805n0:573_0: Vaggacatutthadutiyesu pana tasmiṁyevādhikāre ‘‘paradvebhāvo ṭhāne’’ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:576_0: Saramhā parabhūtānaṁ vagge ghosāghosānaṁ byañjanānaṁ yathākkamaṁ vaggatatiya paṭhamakkharā dvibhāvaṁ gacchanti ṭhāneti ṭhānāsannavasena tabbagge tatiyapaṭhamāva honti.
anya-e0805n0:577_0: Ettha ca sampatte niyamattā ghosāghosaggahaṇena catutthadutiyāva adhippetā, itarathā aniṭṭhappasaṅgosiyā. Tena ‘‘kataññū, tannayo,
anya-e0805n0:577_1: tammayo’’tiādīsu vaggapañcamānaṁ satipi ghosatte tatiyappasaṅgona hoti, ṭhānādhikārato vā.
anya-e0805n0:578_0: Gharādīsu pa u du niādiparacatutthesu tāva – pagharati paggharati, evaṁ uggharati, ugghāṭeti, dugghoso, nigghoso, eseva cajjhānaphalo, paṭhamajjhānaṁ, abhijjhāyati, ujjhāyati, viddhaṁseti, uddhaṁsito, uddhāro, niddhāro, niddhano, niddhuto, vibbhanto, ubbhato, dubbhikkhaṁ, nibbhayaṁ, tabbhāvo, catuddhā, cabhubbhi, chaddhā, saddhammo, sabbhūto, mahaddhano, mahabbhayaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:579_0: Yavata mādesādīsu – bojjhaṅgā, āsabbhaṁ, bujjhitabbaṁ, bujjhati.
anya-e0805n0:580_0: Ṭhāneti kiṁ? Sīlavantassa jhāyino, ye jhānappasutā dhīrā, nidhānaṁ, mahādhanaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:581_0: Rassākāratoparaṁ vaggadutiyesu – pañca khandhā pañcakkhandhā, evaṁrūpakkhandho, akkhamo, abhikkhaṇaṁ, avikkhepo, jātikkhettaṁ, dhātukkhobho, āyukkhayo. Setachattaṁ setacchattaṁ, evaṁ sabbacchannaṁ, vicchinnaṁ, bodhicchāyā, jambucchāyā, samucchedo. Tatra ṭhito tatraṭṭhito, evaṁ thalaṭṭhaṁ, jalaṭṭhaṁ, adhiṭṭhitaṁ, niṭṭhitaṁ, cattāriṭṭhānāni, garuṭṭhāniyo, samuṭṭhito, suppaṭṭhāno. Yasatthero, yattha, tattha, pattharati, vitthāro, abhitthuto, vitthambhito, anutthunaṁ, catuttho, kuttha. Papphoṭeti, mahapphalaṁ, nipphalaṁ, vipphāro, paripphuseyya, madhupphāṇitaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:582_0: Ākārato – ākhāto ākkhāto, evaṁ taṇhākkhayo, āṇākkhettaṁ, saññākkhandho, āchādayati, ācchādayati, evaṁ ācchindati, nāvāṭṭhaṁ, āttharati, āpphoṭeti.
anya-e0805n0:583_0: Saramhāti kiṁ? Saṅkhāro, taṅkhaṇe, sañchannaṁ, taṇṭhānaṁ, santhuto, tamphalaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:584_0: Ṭhāneti kiṁ? Pūvakhajjakaṁ, tassa chaviyādīni chinditvā, yathā ṭhitaṁ, kathaṁ, kammaphalaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:585_1: nitaraṇaṁ iccatra – ‘‘do dhassa cā’’ti ettha caggahaṇassa bahulatthattā tena caggahaṇena yathāpayogaṁ bahudhā ādeso siyā.
anya-e0805n0:586_0: Yathā – ni upasaggato kamu pada ci cara tarānaṁ paṭhamassa vaggadutiyo iminā dvittaṁ, nikkhamati, nipphatti, nicchayo, niccharati, nittharaṇaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:587_0: Tathā bo vassa kuva diva siva vajādīnaṁ dvirūpassāti vakāradvayassa bakāradvayaṁ, yathā – kubbanto, evaṁ kubbāno, kubbanti, sadhātvantayādesassa dvittaṁ. Divati dibbati, evaṁ dibbanto, sibbati, sibbanto, pavajati pabbajati, pabbajanto, nivānaṁ nibbānaṁ, nibbuto, nibbindati, udabbayaṁ iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:588_0: Lo rassa pari taruṇādīnaṁ kvaci. Paripanno palipanno, evaṁ palibodho, pallaṅkaṁ, taruṇo taluno, mahāsālo, māluto, sukhumālo.
anya-e0805n0:589_0: Ṭo tassa dukkatādīnaṁ kvaci. Yathā – dukkataṁ dukkaṭaṁ, evaṁ sukaṭaṁ, pahaṭo, patthaṭo, uddhaṭo, visaṭo iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:590_0: Ko tassa niyatādīnaṁ kvaci. Niyato niyako.
anya-e0805n0:591_0: Yo jassa nijādissa vā, nijaṁputtaṁ niyaṁputtaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:593_0: Tathā ṇo nassa pa pariādito. Panidhānaṁ paṇidhānaṁ, evaṁ paṇipāto, paṇāmo, paṇītaṁ, pariṇato, pariṇāmo, ninnayo niṇṇayo, evaṁ uṇṇato, oṇato iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:596_0: Patiiccetassa upasaggassa sare vā byañjane vā pare kvaci paṭiādeso hoti pubbassaralopo. Paṭaggi, paṭihaññati.
anya-e0805n0:600_0: Puthaiccetassa anto saro ukāro hoti byañjane pare, dvittaṁ. Puthujjano, puthubhūtaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:601_1: ‘‘Puthassa a putha’’iti samāseneva siddhe puna antaggahaṇādhikārena kvaci aputhantassāpi uttaṁ sare.
anya-e0805n0:602_0: Mano aññaṁ manuññaṁ, evaṁ imaṁ evumaṁ, paralopo, iti evaṁ itvevaṁ, ukārassa vakāro.
anya-e0805n0:606_0: Avaiccetassa upasaggassa okāro hoti kvaci byañjane pare. Okāso, onaddho, ovadati, osānaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:612_0: Avasaddassa upapade tiṭṭhamānassa tassokārassa viparīto ca hoti byañjane pare.
anya-e0805n0:613_0: Tassa viparīto tabbiparīto, upoccāritaṁ padaṁ upapadaṁ,
anya-e0805n0:613_2: Casaddo katthaci nivattanattho, dvittaṁ. Uggate sūriye, uggacchati, uggahetvā.
anya-e0805n0:617_0: Byañjane pare kvaci okārāgamo hotīti atippa parasaddehi okārāgamo ‘‘yavamada’’iccādisutte casaddena atippato gakārāgamo ca.
anya-e0805n0:622_0: Manomayaṁ, ayomayaṁ, evaṁ manoseṭṭhā, ayopatto, tapodhano, tamonudo, siroruho, tejokasiṇaṁ, rajojallaṁ, ahorattaṁ, rahogato.
anya-e0805n0:624_0: Sīhagatiyā vādhikārato idha na bhavati, manamattena manacchaṭṭhānaṁ, ayakapallaṁ, tamavinodano, manaāyatanaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:628_0: Taṇhaṁ karo, raṇaṁ jaho, saṁ ṭhito, jutiṁ dharo,
anya-e0805n0:630_0: Vaggabhūte byañjane pare niggahītaṁ kho vaggantaṁ vā pappotīti nimittānusvarānaṁ ṭhānāsannavasena tabbaggapañcamo hoti.
anya-e0805n0:630_1: Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṁ vāsaddo. Tena ‘‘taṇhaṅkaro, raṇañjaho, saṇṭhito, jutindharo, sammato’’tiādīsu niccaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:631_0: Taṅkaroti taṁ karoti, taṅkhaṇaṁ taṁkhaṇaṁ, saṅgaho saṁgaho, taṅghataṁ taṁ ghataṁ. Dhammañcare dhammaṁ care, tañchannaṁ taṁ channaṁ, tañjātaṁ taṁ jātaṁ, taññāṇaṁ taṁ ñāṇaṁ. Taṇṭhānaṁ taṁ ṭhānaṁ, taṇḍahati bhaṁ ḍahati. Tantanoti taṁ tanoti, tanthiraṁ taṁ thiraṁ, tandānaṁ taṁ dānaṁ, tandhanaṁ taṁ dhanaṁ, tanniccutaṁ taṁ niccutaṁ. Tampatto taṁ patto, tamphalaṁ taṁ phalaṁ, tesambodho tesaṁ bodho, sambhūto saṁbhūto, tammittaṁ taṁ mittaṁ. Kiṅkato kiṁ kato,
anya-e0805n0:632_0: Idha na bhavati, na taṁ kammaṁ kataṁ sādhu, saraṇaṁ gacchāmi.
anya-e0805n0:633_0: Sati copari vāggahaṇe vijjhantare vā idha vāggahaṇakaraṇamatthantaraviññāpanatthaṁ,
anya-e0805n0:633_2: Yathā – paṭisaṁlīno paṭisallīno, evaṁ paṭisallāṇo, sallakkhaṇā, sallekho, sallāpo, puṁliṅgaṁ pulliṅgaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:634_0: Paccattaṁ eva, taṁ eva, tañhi tassa,
anya-e0805n0:636_0: Ekārahakāre pare niggahītaṁ kho ñakāraṁ pappoti vā, ekāre ñādesassa dvibhāvo.
anya-e0805n0:637_0: Paccattaññevapaccattaṁ eva, taññeva taṁ eva, tañhi tassa tañhi tassa, evañhi vo evañhi vo.
anya-e0805n0:638_0: Vavatthitavibhāsattā vāsaddassa evahinipātato aññattha na hoti, yathā – evametaṁ, evaṁ hoti.
anya-e0805n0:639_0: Saṁyogo, saṁyojanaṁ, saṁyato, saṁyācikāya, yaṁ yadeva,
anya-e0805n0:641_0: Niggahītaṁ kho yakāre pare saha yakārena ñakāraṁ pappoti vā, ñādesassa dvittaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:642_0: Saññogo saṁyogo, saññojanaṁ saṁyojanaṁ, saññato saṁyato, saññācikāya saṁyācikāya, yaññadeva yaṁ yadeva,
anya-e0805n0:643_0: Vāsaddassa vavatthitavibhāsattāva saṁpadantato ca sabbanāmayakāraparato ca niggahītā aññattha na hoti. Yathā – etaṁ yojanaṁ, taṁ yānaṁ, saraṇaṁ yanti.
anya-e0805n0:644_0: Ettha ca ‘‘saha ye cā’’ti vattabbe ‘‘sa ye cā’’ti vacanato suttantesu sukhuccāraṇatthamakkharalopopīti daṭṭhabbaṁ,
anya-e0805n0:644_2: sayaṁ abhiññāya sacchikatvā sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā,
anya-e0805n0:645_0: Taṁ ahaṁ brūmi, yaṁ āhu, dhanaṁ eva, kiṁ etaṁ, nindituṁ arahati, yaṁ aniccaṁ, taṁ anattā, etaṁ avoca, etaṁ eva iccatra –
anya-e0805n0:647_0: Niggahītassa kho sare pare makāradakārādesā honti vā.
anya-e0805n0:647_1: Ettha ca vāsaddādhikārassa vavatthitavibhāsattā dakāro yatetasaddato parasseva.
anya-e0805n0:648_0: Tamahaṁ brūmi, yamāhu, dhanameva, kimetaṁ, ninditumarahati, yadaniccaṁ, tadanattā, etadavoca, etadeva.
anya-e0805n0:649_0: Vāti kiṁ? Taṁ ahaṁ, etaṁ eva, akkocchi maṁ avadhi maṁ.
anya-e0805n0:650_0: Ettha ca madāti yogavibhāgena byañjanepi vā makāro.
anya-e0805n0:653_0: Niggahītaṁ kho sare pare lopaṁ pappoti kvaci chandānurakkhaṇe sukhuccāraṇaṭṭhāne. Pubbassaralopo, parassa asaṁyogantassa dīgho.
anya-e0805n0:654_0: Tāsāhaṁ santike, vidūnaggaṁ, tassa adāsāhaṁ, tathāgatāhaṁ, evāhaṁ, kyāhaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:656_0: Ariyasaccānaṁ dassanaṁ, etaṁ buddhānaṁ sāsanaṁ, saṁratto, saṁrāgo, saṁrambho, avisaṁhāro, ciraṁ pavāsiṁ, gantuṁ kāmo,
anya-e0805n0:658_0: Niggahītaṁ kho byañjane ca pare lopaṁ pappoti kvaci chandānurakkhaṇādimhi.
anya-e0805n0:659_0: Ariyasaccāna dassanaṁ, etaṁ buddhāna sāsanaṁ, sāratto, sārāgo, sārambho, avisāhāro, cirappavāsiṁ, dvittaṁ, gantukāmo, gantumano.
anya-e0805n0:661_0: Kataṁ iti, kiṁ iti, abhinanduṁ iti, uttattaṁ iva, cakkaṁ iva, kaliṁ idāni, kiṁ idāni, tvaṁ asi, idaṁ api, uttariṁ api, dātuṁ api,
anya-e0805n0:661_1: sadisaṁ eva itīdha ‘‘niggahītamhā, lopa’’nti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:663_0: Niggahītamhā paro saro lopaṁ pappoti vā. Niggahītassa vaggantattaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:664_0: Katanti, kinti, abhinandunti, uttattaṁva, cakkaṁva, kalindāni, kindāni, tvaṁsi, idampi, uttarimpi, dātumpi, sadisaṁva.
anya-e0805n0:665_0: Vāti kiṁ? Kataṁ iti, kimiti, dātumapi, sāmaṁ eva.
anya-e0805n0:666_0: Ayampi vāsaddassa vavatthitavibhāsattā itīvīdānisīpevādito aññattha na hoti. Yathā – ahaṁ ettha, etaṁ ahosi.
anya-e0805n0:667_1: pupphaṁ assā uppajjati itīdha sare pare lutte vipariṇāmena ‘‘parasmiṁ, sare, lutte’’ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:669_0: Niggahītamhā parasmiṁ sare lutte byañjano saññogo ce,
anya-e0805n0:670_1: idha pana saṁyujjatīti saññogo, purimo vaṇṇo,
anya-e0805n0:671_0: Evaṁ sa te āsavā, pupphaṁsā uppajjati.
anya-e0805n0:673_0: Casaddena tiṇṇaṁ byañjanānaṁ sarūpasaṁyogopi visaññogo hoti. Yathā – agyāgāraṁ, vutyassa.
anya-e0805n0:674_0: Cakkhu udapādi, ava siro, yāvacidha bhikkhave, aṇuthūlāni,
anya-e0805n0:674_1: ta sampayuttā ibhīdha ‘‘sare, āgamo, kvaci, byañjane’’ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:676_0: Niggahītañca āgamo hoti sare vā byañjane vā kvaci sukhuccāraṇaṭṭhāne.
anya-e0805n0:677_0: Cakkhuṁ udapādi, avaṁsiro, yāvañcidha bhikkhave, aṇuṁthūlāni, taṁsampayuttā, evaṁ taṅkhaṇe, taṁsabhāvo.
anya-e0805n0:678_0: Kvacīti kiṁ? Na hi etehi, idha ceva.
anya-e0805n0:679_0: Evaṁ vutte, taṁ sādhu, ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā,
anya-e0805n0:679_1: aggiṁva sanamaṁ itīdha lopādesakāriye sampatte yebhuyyena tadapavādatthamāha.
anya-e0805n0:681_0: Niggahītaṁ kho byañjane pare aṁiti hoti.
anya-e0805n0:683_0: Evaṁ vutte, taṁ sādhu, ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā, aggiṁva sandhamaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:686_0: Ye idha amhehi visesato na upadiṭṭhā upasagganipātādayo,
anya-e0805n0:686_1: tesaṁ vuttayogato vuttanayena sarasandhādīsu vuttanayānusārena rūpasiddhi veditabbā.
anya-e0805n0:687_0: Tena ‘‘do dhassa cā’’ti sutte casaddena pariyādīnaṁ rahanādivaṇṇassa vipariyayo yavādīhi,
anya-e0805n0:687_1: yathā – pariyudāhāsi payirudāhāsi, ariyassa ayirassa, bahvābādho bavhābādho, na abhineyya anabhineyya.
anya-e0805n0:688_0: ‘‘Taṁ imināpi jānāthā’’ti ettha ‘‘paro vā saro’’ti sare lutte ‘‘tatrākāro’’ti yogavibhāgena akāro niggahītassa dakāro, tadamināpi jānātha iccādi.
